pageContent: Purpose: This study is to compare the Mount Sinai Erectile Function Score (MSEFS), our brachytherapy program's physician-assigned scale, with patients' independently completed International Index of Erectile Function-5 (IIEF-5).

metaData.source:
Nursing considerations in brachytherapy-related erectile dysfunction
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16225341/
